data.title: Yummy
data.text: Atmosphere is perfect.  Drinks are perfect, food is amazing!  I tried several different sushi and all were spot on! My husband had Ronin rice with shrimp AMAZING .  So glad we came and we will be back!

data.title: very nice
data.text: i liked this place a lot. the sevice was very kind and welcoming. I have had better sushi before but it was very fresh and the sweet po roll is really good!!!

data.title: great sushi
data.text: Ronin Sushi is a great place for good sushi. I have never been disappointed by the food or the service. It has a great feel and reminds me of a little place in NYC.

data.title: Fresh food, good service
data.text: Stopped here for some rolls. Glad we did. Had  three different roll types, all fresh and great tasting.Service was friendly and good. I will stop here again next time I'm in Daytona.

data.title: Best Sushi Hands down
data.text: So I've always been very picky with Sushi. So I'm always hesitant to check out a new place, when I moved to Daytona Beach area I tried it out and was very pleased. There was a point in time that I came in every Friday night, sit at the bar and have my usual. The Kobe Roll is a must everytime you come here (it's like going to Starbucks and not ordering a coffee), yes it is that good! I personally also like the Ocean 111 roll. Appetizers you can never go wrong with the Krab Rangoons or the Dynamite Shrimp. Dessert, i'd definitely give the fried ice cream a go. If you're feeling something different give their flavored Sake a try! Also this is a very nice atmosphere to take a date or even a group of friends. Great service. I'd definitely choose Ronin over these "big name" places. Trust me, you will not be disappointed!

data.title: Second visit, still GREAT
data.text: If you are interested in delicious sushi and great service this is your place. Michelle was our server and she answered every question and was very good at her job. Friendly and knowledgeable. Now about the food. I had miso soup,the ginger salad and the salmon salad, all were delicious! We also shared the Kobe sliders and the seared scallops all very good. My family all shared sushi, we really enjoyed the Ronin roll (spicy tuna) The youngest of our group had the Fried Ice cream for dessert and she & my husband enjoyed it. We will definitely go back to Ronin.

data.title: Very enteraining
data.text: Service and food were great we came with a large group all orders were cooked beyond expectation the chef was very entertaining all around great experience would highly recommend this resturant

data.title: Best sushi I've ever had
data.text: I can't believe I'm raving about a restaurant in Daytona, but this place is amazing.  There are so many different types of rolls and they are always super fresh and tasty.  The inside of the restaurant itself is much more sophisticated than it appears on the outside and looks like it belongs in a big city.  I think the prices are somewhat high for the area, so it's not someplace we can frequent as often as I would like, but I really enjoy it when we go there.

data.title: Eccellent sushi
data.text: We ordered 4 different selections. The Maine was excellent. Shrimp deux is a favorite. The amigo is good for a spicy selection. Rising sun was good but didnt care for the raw piece in top. It was tasty just not for me. Wait staff is friendly and service is great

data.title: Best sushi ever!!
data.text: I live half an hour away, but I visit several times a month. The sushi is always spectacular and the staff is consistently wonderful. The servers and bartenders always take amazing care of my family and I. They are always busy, but everyone is very professional and prompt. I highly recommend the crab Rangoon and the special mango roll. Ask for Alia, she is fantastic!!

data.title: Nice little sushi place
data.text: I was kind of disappointed they had no tempura main course but I loved what I had. The Dynamite Shrimp was fantastic. Next time I'll get a double order. Hubby ordered scallops on half shell and loved it. We shared the special Kobe Beef roll which for my tastes had just a bit too much truffle flavor, and a California roll.  For sashimi we shared yellowtail (small portions but excellent) and some tuna, also excellent.  I also had the half size portion of stir fried veggies with Jasmine rice, delicious and too much to finish. Worth a visit!

data.title: Amazing!
data.text: Excellent sushi, fresh and innovative. The atmosphere is great for a date night. Ordered the ronin rice bowl which was really flavorful and well above par for most "fried rice" dishes. Make sure to try the Kobe roll, it's unlike anything I've had at other sushi spots in the area..not to mention it's to die for!

data.title: Best Sushi Rest in Daytona
data.text: Great atmosphere, staff and decor. I have eaten here about 50 plus times. Kurt, the owner is super nice and so are all the staff all the way back to the sushi bar and kitchen. Well worth visiting especially if your in town on business and staying at the Hilton or shores resort

data.title: Excellent!
data.text: Some of the BEST sushi I have had in quite a long time! Wednesday has a special and was very crowded, but we were still able to get a table. Everything we ordered was fantastic! The Lychee Saki was pleasantly sweet and perfect with dessert.

data.title: Best Sushi in Volusia County; however, too busy to ever get in.
data.text: Great Sushi - always fresh and made to order; the Chefs and Wait staff try hard to please; however, too busy to relax and enjoy.  Nothing to the contrary; they do not care that they are too busy, "It is what it is - attitude".

data.title: $5 Sunday's and Wednesday's are great!
data.text: Ronin has some of the best sushi in town, but it's a great deal on Sundays and Wednesdays. They have $5 sushi rolls, 2 for 1 house wines, beers and sake.  In addition to the sushi menus, they have a great choice of items for those not into sushi, like my granddaughter. My son-in-law was impressed at the number of pieces of sushi you get in a roll, and way over-ordered. He loved every bit of it! My daughter, who is on a diet, was able to find plenty to eat as well. Get there early on Wednesday and Sunday though, it's very popular with the locals. Great and friendly servers as well.

data.title: Still in love with Ronin!
data.text: Pineapple Sake. Dumpling appetizer (or Edamame). Kobe Roll, Red Sands Roll, Hot Gator Roll. Mochi for dessert. Perfect!

data.title: Couples dinner
data.text: Husband, best friend,her husband, and i had dinner here one night. Delicious dumplings and cali roll. the fried ice cream was to die for.

data.title: Sushi @ the Wharf!
data.text: Our 2nd visit here. We had lunch the first time & dinner the 2nd time.  Our fav so far, is the Cashew Crab roll.  Calamari appetizer was very good, would definitely order again. Have had good service both times.  Their sushi is a bit more creative than the usual.

data.title: Excellent Selection And Flavor
data.text: I am not a sushi eater as such, but my party was interested in eating it so we went there.  The place was immaculate, clean, friendly and the smells were delicious.  The food portions were big and they had preparation methods that catered to those who were trying sushi for the first time or not too crazy about sushi.  I found that to be incredibly intelligent marketing!  The food when it arrived, was amazing in its presentation and flavor.  We all tried a little bit of each other's entrees and everything was delicious and filling.  I would easily go there again.
